page.title: 05UNEMPLOYMENT IN DONCASTER
page.content: UNEMPLOYMENT IS THE WORST PROBLEM OF 1985 AND IS CAUSING GREAT CONCERN.MANY PEOPLE THINK THAT UNEMPLOYMENT IS JUST ONE BIG GROUP OF PEOPLE BUT THERE ARE MANY DIFFERENT GROUPS SUCH AS SINGLE PERSONS,SINGLE PARENTS,DISABLED PEOPLE AND SCHOOL LEAVERS. THERE ARE OVER THREE MILLION UNEMPLOYED IN THE WHOLE COUNTRY.THE PERCENTAGE OF UNEMPLOYED IN THE DONCASTER METROPOLITAN BOROUGH IS 18.6. THIS DOES NOT INCLUDE THE REDUNDANCIES IN THE LOCAL PITS ANNOUNCED RECENTLY. THE HOPE FOR THE DISTANT FUTURE MAY BE BETTER BUT FOR THE MOMENT THE SITUATION IS GRIM.THERE ARE BENEFITS FOR THE UNEMPLOYED TO HELP THEM LIVE AS NORMAL A LIFE AS POSSIBLE. THEY CAN ENJOY SOME SPORTING FACILITIES IF THEY ARE CARRYING THEIR 'DOLE CARD'. FUTURE TRENDS WILL DEPEND ON TECHNICAL DEVELOPMENTS.
